title: Science Education Design Integrating Technology and Digital Games

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: A process analyzing digital game and technology integration cases through a phenomenological approach in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments

learning_goals: Learners can analyze digital game-based science education scenarios using a phenomenological approach.
Learners can complete a PBL project for technology-integrated instructional design based on case studies.
Learners can develop digital game-based science learning modules executable in a smartphone environment.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
